events.title: Annual Art Exhibition
events.description: Showcase of student paintings, sculptures, and mixed media works from the year.

events.title: Creative Workshop: Watercolor Techniques
events.description: Hands-on workshop exploring watercolor painting with professional guidance.

events.title: National Robotics Competition
events.description: Compete against top schools in building and programming autonomous robots.

events.title: Arduino & Coding Bootcamp
events.description: Learn Arduino programming, sensors, and basic electronics for robotics projects.

events.title: Weekly Youth Fellowship
events.description: Bible study, worship, prayer, and fellowship for spiritual growth.

events.title: Christmas Outreach Program
events.description: Deliver gifts, food, and spread Christmas joy to children in need.

events.title: Inter-School Debate Championship
events.description: Compete with regional schools in policy and public forum debate.

events.title: Public Speaking Masterclass
events.description: Training in speech writing, delivery, and confidence building.

events.title: Winter Theater Production
events.description: Full-scale performance of a classic play directed by students.

events.title: Acting & Improv Workshop
events.description: Professional actor leads workshop on stage presence and improvisation.

events.title: Cultural Heritage Festival
events.description: Celebrate Kenya's diverse cultures through dance, food, and exhibitions.

events.title: Model United Nations Conference
events.description: Simulated UN sessions with diplomacy, negotiation, and resolution writing.

events.title: School Magazine Launch
events.description: Official release of the annual school magazine designed by the club.

events.title: Photography & Editing Workshop
events.description: Learn professional photo editing and journalism photography skills.

events.title: Math Olympiad 2026
events.description: Annual competition testing advanced problem-solving and critical thinking.

events.title: Puzzle & Logic Challenge Day
events.description: Fun day of brain teasers, riddles, and mathematical games.

events.title: Christmas Carol Concert
events.description: Beautiful evening of choir performances, solos, and festive music.

events.title: Instrument Mastery Workshop
events.description: Learn guitar, keyboard, drums, or traditional instruments from experts.

events.title: Annual Science Fair
events.description: Showcase student experiments, inventions, and research projects.

events.title: Chemistry Magic Show
events.description: Fun and educational chemistry demonstrations for all students.

events.title: Annual Scouts Camp
events.description: Weekend camp with survival skills, hiking, and team building.

events.title: Community Service Day
events.description: Clean-up drive and social service project with local residents.

events.title: Great Tree Planting Drive
events.description: Plant 1000+ trees to combat climate change and beautify our environment.

events.title: Wildlife Conservation Talk
events.description: Guest speaker from Kenya Wildlife Service on conservation efforts.
